1.Title: Slumdog Millionaire
1.Actors: Dev Patel, Freida Pinto, Saurabh Shukla, Anil Kapoor
1.Plot: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of 'Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?' He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.

2.Title: The Notebook
2.Actors: Gena Rowlands, James Garner, Rachel McAdams, Ryan Gosling
2.Plot: A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.

3.Title: Snakes on a Plane
3.Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Julianna Margulies, Nathan Phillips, Rachel Blanchard
3.Plot: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and poisonous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

4.Title: Finding Nemo
4.Actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
4.Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
